title:
Some years ago a cement plant operated on the site where Titam wants to operate. this earlier plant had far kess pollution controls than thise proposed by Titan.



Is there any record of anyone having health problems caused by the cement plant operation? if not, what is the fear of health problems from the Titan operatio?
text:
Here's a link to StarNewsOnline.com topics page about Titan
Cement. It should answer most of your questions. Unfortunately, I
could find no references to health problems related the previous
plant.



http://www.starnewsonline.com/section/topic62
